articles.title: Penumbral lunar eclipse to occur in India on May 5; here's the science behind it - Republic World
articles.description: The Moon will undergo a penumbral eclipse on the intervening nights of May 5 and 6 and the event will be visible across Europe, Africa, and Asia.
articles.content: The Moon will undergo a penumbral eclipse on the intervening nights of May 5 and 6 and the event will be visible across different parts of the world. This event will begin at an estimated time of 8.4… [+1637 chars]

articles.description: Recap of the semifinal featuring Satwiksairaj Rankireddy and Chirag Shetty and Olympic champions Lee Yang and Wang Chi-lin.
articles.content:
That will be all for this blog. See you all tomorrow.
